page.title: 11TRANSPORT FIRMS,NTH.KILWORTH
page.content: {REG MORRIS TRANSPORT {""""""""""""""""""""} This forty year old firm moved to Kilworth from Husbands Bosworth.They run articulated tanker lorries. They have five tractor units and nine trailer units,and also run a small delivery van.Their loads include:- milk, edible oils,tallow and syrup. Nine people are employed altogther. {CARRYFAST} {"""""""""} This depot, one of eleven managed by this company,have occupied their present site by the old railway line for thirteen years.They operate fifteen articulated lorries.These carry out a parcel delivery service. Besides the drivers, they employ 25 loaders, and office staff.
